display_long_description:
🎧 MixMaster VR puts you at the heart of the party with the most immersive DJ experience in virtual reality!

Step behind the decks and take control of two fully interactive virtual turntables. Load your favorite tracks, mix between them with a realistic crossfader, adjust EQs, apply effects, and scratch using responsive jog wheels. Whether you’re playing to a small lounge crowd or headlining a massive festival stage, MixMaster VR gives you the tools to perform like a real DJ.

💿 Key Features:

Realistic Virtual DJ Decks – Control tempo, pitch, EQ, filters, and effects with intuitive VR sliders and knobs.

Waveform Visualization – See the beats, breakdowns, and drops with dynamic, scrolling track waveforms.

Looping & Cue Points – Set loop ranges and jump between cue points with precision.

Local Track Loading – Import your own MP3 files directly into the game.

Immersive Venues – Perform in clubs, rooftop bars, and massive festival stages.

Beginner-Friendly & Pro-Ready – Learn the basics or push your skills to the limit.

Whether you want to practice your mixing, throw a private party, or challenge your friends in VR DJ battles, MixMaster VR delivers the ultimate music performance playground.

🎶 It’s not just a game – it’s your DJ journey. Step up to the decks and own the night!
